column2: "Don't worry, I'm not hiding anything. It's just that I'm in the middle of an investigation. I don't have time to worry about anyone else."
"We're both ARKS, so I'm sure there'll be times when we're both after the same thing."
"If you want to talk, it would be more efficient if we saved it until then."
"How does that sound? Alright, later then."
